website_summaries.verdict: A simple, accurate ear thermometer that's perfect for using with squirmy kids.
pros: Quick readings and results for use with babies and children

customer_reviews.title: Appalling accuracy. Hopefully a faulty product?
customer_reviews.text: I am a GP and use a Braun thermometer at work so I thought I would buy one for my children at home. This thermometer varies by over a degree on readings from the same ear taken a few seconds apart. Both ears also vary hugely. This was a complete waste of money as I can't work out if my child has a temperature as one reading says they do and the next says they don't. I will be sending this product back, I hope it's just mine that's faulty!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wildly unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after overly keen wife poked a thermometer at me once too often, looking for easier readings. After a series of contradictory indications, we cross-checked it against a conductive thermometer, and caught it reading a whole degree and a half high. Unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Nerdstrike

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the reviewers who have found this inaccurate from first use. Being a persistent type I take my temp in both ears until I get the same reading otherwise it can be up to 2 degrees out. I would never trust it for a child.
customer_reviews.author: regular reader

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far it is working very well. Similar operating system to the Braun professional thermoscan that I use as an ambulance first responder. The readings are within 0.2 degrees C of the professional unit which is fine for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr R S Holt

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: 3 months and now not working. Has changed from Celsius for no apparent reason and despite changing the battery it keeps coming up with error message. £28 is quite a lot of money for something so rarely used and would expect it to last much longer. So won't be buying Braun again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wrong temperature
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this product for one year. It shows the wrong temperature. We have been to a hospital recently and took it with us. Compare to two different doctor`s measurement 38.00 our measurement at the same time with this product was 37.00. We have changed cups as well and nothing changed. Also this one product can show different temperature at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: EZ

customer_reviews.title: Gives false readings after 5-6 months
customer_reviews.text: I gave 5 stars before- I take it back. It is awful - started giving false readings after 5 months. Don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer stopped working in August. It is now useless. It is grossly unfair the return window is only 1 month in duration. I will NEVER buy another Braun thermometer again. AVOID and spend your money elsewhere!!!
customer_reviews.author: loz

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate by a degree
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use after being in hospital due to a high risk of infection. I took it to hospital to test it against their thermometers and it’s a degree out. So whenever I use it I get three beeps which means temp is above “normal” Not very reassuring. Disappointed to find I’ve missed the return windows as it won’t be used again!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs P

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this it's very Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Wildly inaccurate, ended up in hospital twice unnessesarily, only when on second visit I checked my reading with it after the ambulance crew checked it, did I realise it was useless, I should explain im on chemotherapy and temperature is vitally important to avoid the risk of death. I wouldn't waste my Money, I am too late to send it back so will have to bear the cost, the worst thing is the ambulance crew recommended another braun unit which I bought for £33 not that much more really for peace of mind
customer_reviews.author: juan king

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Dont entirely trust this. Bought it just in time for my daughter to have a virus that lasted 5 days. Sometimes she felt boiling to touch, but the thermometer said she was a normal temperature. Also I went through about 3 of the little covers (it wont read the temperature without using one, but they crumple and then it doesnt give an accurate reading). So I will have to buy more to make sure I always have some to change to. It is easy to use and easy to read and very quick giving result, but I'm not convinced its accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Ceinwyn

customer_reviews.title: Never two readings the same
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product thinking it would be more accurate than the forehead strip which i have used for years. Nothing further from the truth. I can get a reading of 36.4 on one ear and 38.2 in the other. Subsequent reading in each ear change every time and I need to take an average to avoid calling the doctor all the time. Most inaccurate and unhelpful. Never really sure if it is a fever or not. Total waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth590

customer_reviews.title: Concerns about accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Not accurate. If you measure your temperature and a few seconds later, measure it again, and then a few seconds later, measure again, you get three values which can range between 1.2 degrees. Sufficient to give a false positive for fever or a false negative normal temperature. Will observe for a few more weeks, but might have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Inder

customer_reviews.title: Did not get product as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This is not an infrared thermometer! It is a standard digital thermometer. Is this a joke?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thermometer as my 7 month old son has a condition where it's very important to be able to monitor his temperature accurately. He had a high temp over the weekend and I went to use our new thermometer for the first time. It gave 4 different readings in a row, from the same ear. There was differences of 2 degrees between the readings given. This is obviously unacceptable when its vitally important to keep accurate readings. I ended up having to take him in to hospital to be checked as I couldn't rely on the readings I was getting. Totally unacceptable and would like to go about getting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is so much easier to use than an old-style thermometer. I have said that it is accurate, but of course I cannot really confirm this. But the results seem plausible. The audible signals - marking the start and finish of the measurement - could do with being a little louder, but this might disturb a small child. The backlit display works well. On balance, I am quite impressed.
customer_reviews.author: red90

customer_reviews.title: Pay more if you want a thermometer that actually works
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately another inaccurate thermometer. As a health care provider, I thought I’d go with Braunn as a brand we use in the hospital but a cheap model such as this hasn’t lasted long at all. When we brought it I was really impressed but less than 3 months later it’s showing very low temperatures on everyone I try, and very different temperatures each time also. Pay a little more and get a thermometer that will last
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to keep check on my babies health. Really easy to use, light, simple. Gives an audible beep to confirm normal (one), low grade (two) and fever (four beeps). The display doesn't light up which was a bit of a downside for us as it meant having to turn a light on when checking temperature at night time. Also the cover cracked immediately, though this doesn't affect function it doesn't look great. There other big downside is the unit stopped working 8 months into use. It just shows an error message when you try and use it. We tried new cover and new batteries but it's just not working. Quite disappointing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: 00Wizzard

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in January and haven’t had to use it yet. However with the recent pandemic and my parter being a paramedic we have been taken our temperatures and our babies temperature regularly only to find that the product is dangerously inaccurate. I can take my temperature seconds apart from the same ear and have up to 5 degrees difference. It’s disgusting that this can even be sold.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Abysmal waste of money- not fit for purpose
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace one I’d had for years that was excellent, but unfortunately had finally given up. This one has wildly different readings when double-checking, even measuring my temperature as 38.6 when I felt fine! Very frustrating when I chose the thermometer for it’s supposed accuracy and precision. Also it is now outside the window for return as I hadn’t had cause to use it earlier, so no chance of a replacement to see if it’s the same story across board or if I just got a dud. And the discrepancies are not due to user error- I’ve used these thermometers for years!
customer_reviews.author: L. Cottingham

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT Thermometer for Chemotherapy.  So Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant little electronic thermometer. Just place it in the ear and press. Displays the previous reading first. Much easier than some that have to be programmed with the age of the patient before you can begin. I am undergoing chemotherapy and have to test my temperature every day, this little thermometer makes life a lot easier. A real bargain at the price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve purchased this as my last one broke, but it is regularly used. I do notice quite a difference between readings for example yesterday the reading was 38.7 then a minute later 38.4 and then the next moment 37.7 which is quite a difference in readings in the space of 5 minutes. I do feel like it’s not the most accurate and find it hard to trust so take several readings.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as originals Braun Thermoscans
customer_reviews.text: I've had a Braun Thermoscan since my kids were born 20 years ago, and its still going strong apart from something is loose inside. I bought this as a spare when on offer. Its too late to return, but having not needed to use it until over year later, I've discovered its reading way above any other thermometer. Meaning I have to recheck with the older reliable model. SO, no I dont have a temperature or Covid symptoms! It's great to use, but pointless if inaccurate. Wonder if they can be recalibrated!??
customer_reviews.author: Mas

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for home use
customer_reviews.text: We bought a digital mouth thermometer, which took too long with a wriggling baby. We bought a thermometer gun, which jst was't acurate for body temperatures. we then bought this. It's such a relief to measure our childs temperature and trust the result. This is essentially instant. I did look at other models and wen't with this one becuase of the speed of the reading. This is perfect for home use, I don't know what other features you'd need beyond this.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: too many variations
customer_reviews.text: Notice how Oral B (made by Braun) have so many models on the market ? Similarly the TehrmoScans have multiple variation of models. Just like Oral B, where the brushes make the profits it is the filters which generate the profits. .... would have purchased cheaper model of ThermoScan therefore, but quirk of Amazon, on day of purchase, this model was cheaper than model(s) with lower spec.
customer_reviews.author: Exploration HSE Advisor

customer_reviews.title: Must have for all households with a child
customer_reviews.text: Affordable thermometer that gives pretty close to accurate readings. Sometimes it does give a variety of readings but I don’t know what causes it to behave like that at times. But I just do it 3 or 5 and pick the most common number. The thermometer doesn’t work without the disposable plastic covers, which are included but can also be purchased separately if you need more. Definitely worth getting for the times when the little one has a fever. It helped us get our daughter referred to the hospital quicker due to high fevers recently because I’d been taking her temperature using this and noting down the readings and times.
customer_reviews.author: NewBornVamp

customer_reviews.title: Worth paying for the braun name
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Made the mistake of buying a cheaper model from different brand and regretted it. Braun is trustworthy name and worth extra money. This is all you need to check family temps and although it’s not got all the options of some of their more expensive models it has the essentials. Gives you confidence when they are ill to track their temps accurately. Also the number of beeps signals the range when taking in the dark, I like this feature. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pecky 83

customer_reviews.title: Have cast this evil thing into the deepest darkest pit I could find......
customer_reviews.text: Completely useless with random readings changing minute to minute - variations from 39.7 to 36.6 over a 5 minute spell. Had completely freaked me out until I realised this product is utterly not for for purpose. Do not even think about buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Lord Bubbacub

customer_reviews.title: Completely inaccurate - DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Completely inaccurate. Yes you have a temperature, no you don’t, yes you do, no you don’t and so on and so on. Annoying at the best of times, downright infuriating in the time of Covid. REALLY disappointed because I had a Braun before and it was brilliant. Complete dud. Had to throw in the bin.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. V. Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and fast
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why we didn't get one sooner. We've been using the under armpit one of a different brand and it's so slow and with a wriggling crying baby it's almost impossible to keep it there long enough without distressing her. But this one, on first use, stuck it in her ear and done. Only a slight moan from the baby, but it was over with so soon it didn't end in a fit of crying. I highly recommend this and wish I got it a year ago.
customer_reviews.author: AP83

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and quick results . Exactly what is needed in these Corona times Huge instruction booklet comes with it but not necessary as it is so simple to use. Only downside that we've found is that it's a little difficult to store in the box it comes with so we've had to find an alternative storage. However that is such a minor issue it's hardly worth mentioning!
customer_reviews.author: N. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews but I’m so disappointed with this product that I feel I need to help others to not make the same mistake. We previously had a different Braun thermometer- the Thermoscan 7 with Age Precision Ear Thermometer. This was excellent, until it randomly stopped working after a few years. So we ordered this as a replacement. It’s completely useless as it is so inaccurate. It gives a completely different reading for each ear. For example, when checking my son’s temperature in one ear, it was so low he would be hypothermic. Then the other ear was nornsl. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable!
customer_reviews.text: The thermometer itself is very clear and easy to use but I wouldn’t say it’s reliable. I tried it on my son who was running a fever and after repeatedly checking his temperature it varied from 36.4 to 39.1! Luckily a friend let me borrow hers which was more consistent and a lot cheaper than what I paid for this. Save yourself some money and try a cheaper alternative because I really don’t think this is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: lukasz

customer_reviews.title: Contradictory indicators
customer_reviews.text: I had to ask for an exchange as mine was giving contradictory indicators. The numbers say that I have no fever (normal temp), yet I was getting two beeps all the time. The exchange was very straightforward though. I just hope the replacement item is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Bestee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We needed a thermometer for the little one that was easy to use, we had been using a under the armpit one which was a nightmare keeping it in place and took a while to give an accurate temp. This one is so easy, simply place in the ear anf you get an instant temperature. One of the best things you can buy as a parent to keep track of the little one when they are not well.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl & Chris

customer_reviews.title: a poor quality item
customer_reviews.text: This is not a simple thermometer to use but worse appears to be a rubbish item. It fails to give an accurate reading and keeps coming up with error messages, a product despite the brand name by far best to avoid. I gave it to a doctor friend of mine and he could not make head or tail of how it was supposed to work and failed to get any meaningful reading. I am going to try it out with 4 other doctor friends, but I suspect it will be returning whence it came before long, a pity because never have had to return any Amazon product before, wastage of space, money and postage.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase I have ever made in my life with regards to a thermometer. The thermometer is extremely inaccurate, readings change dramatically, unable to assess an individual with a temperature with this thermometer due to its inaccuracy and unreliability.
customer_reviews.author: Becci

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Profiteering seller.
customer_reviews.text: As I didn't have a thermometer at home at the beginning of the pandemic I looked up reviews and this item appeared well regarded. I certainly works and fulfils all it's advertised functions but I now see it is selling at a third of what I was charged. I won't be buying from this opportunistic seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home use
customer_reviews.text: Bought to monitor temperature during the pandemic, there are times where my imagination can get carried away and this little gem brings my anxiety back down to earth knowing I'm not feverish. So simple to use, highly accurate e.g. my temperature will hit the perfect 36.9 degrees mark on a regular basis. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Gaynor

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, been wanting one of these for ages but due to the price couldn’t afford one,been using under the arm one which takes ages to get a reading managed to get this one half price and oh what a god send it is. I would say it’s definitely worth the money full price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our thermometer was faulty and had to be returned
customer_reviews.text: This device was supposed to emit an audible signal (beeps) but the one we received did not. So back it went. A pity, because otherwise it was easy to use once I had learned it insisted on a new hygienic cover for each use. Much quicker than a mouth thermometer (about one second rather than a minute), and undoubtedly easier to use on fractious children.
customer_reviews.author: R E Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to use but I find this thermometer to be pretty inconsistent - I find myself having to take 3 or 4 readings to get an average rather than having faith in the first reading which isn't great for confidence when dealing with a poorly little one.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: good brand however didnt work
customer_reviews.text: set up item waited to take my sons temp who was poorly once took it said he had an extremely high temp but our old in the mouth thermometer was reading a little lower to check this we took both mine and my husbands with both and according to the in the ear one we all had very high temps but both myself and my husband are both well. we now have a less know brand which we have checked against a number of different ones and this is measuring the same, named brand not always the best. Item return awaiting refund.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Denny

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate and no customer support
customer_reviews.text: This product it completely inaccurate. It gives a different temperature in the same ear, using the same method, with just a few seconds between readings. I am following the instructions on how to use it, keeping it clean and using new lens filters. I have found it impossible to contact Braun for support or a refund. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy. It is cheaper than other models
customer_reviews.text: Not very accurate. I bought this because of the Braun name. I also have a very old, 10 years, Braun model. The ten year old one is going strong, just the button is a bit sticky. This new model is not as accurate as the old one; frequently gives results that vary by 1 degree centigrade.. far outside the stated accuracy of 2.8 deg C. Not very happy. It is cheaper than other models.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Middle

customer_reviews.title: Simply unreliable
customer_reviews.text: This is the most unreliable thermometer I have ever owned. I should have returned it as it failed since day one and it is now in its box in a drawer as it cannot be trusted. Differences of up to 2 degrees Celsius from readings in different ears! We even get inconsistent readings in the same ear, now 39C, now 37.5C, test again and now 38.2C... within seconds from one another. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: During the lockdown I have measure myself everyday make sure I don't have temperature. Everything was fine. If it can measure my forehead for temperature that will be great. Measure inside of ear I don't share with anyone
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Fast, accurate and repeatable results
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is so much better than the previous one I had (which is a Braun too but one where you put the thermometer in your mouth). Results are effectively instant. The most impressive things is that repeated measurements give the same result, the oral thermometer I had before used to sometimes vary quite a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Clive

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great and very simple to use - read instructions first tho 🤭... Initially thought it faulty. Turned it on, tried in ear a few times, nothing doing, decided to read instructions (properly, this time) before packing back to Amazon. Realised I'd missed one line of text - you need to press on button again when touching ear..oops! Beeped with reading in 1 second - Mum all ok TG.
customer_reviews.author: Marian

customer_reviews.title: Essential Item
customer_reviews.text: All households should have a simple thermometer. Essential not only in the Covid 19 era but to assess extent of fever in children and in adults with underlying conditions.
customer_reviews.author: SusanG

customer_reviews.title: This thermometer would be good if it worked
customer_reviews.text: When I bought the thermometer I checked that it was working ok but had no need to use it. however I did need to use it last week and found that it is not working. It will not stop flashing to say insert an ear cover when there is one on. How do I return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Easy use
customer_reviews.text: Had a bit of a wait for this product but well worth it. Easy to follow instructions easy to use and came with quantity of disposable caps for hygienic use. Useful addition to any first aid kit
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin
customer_reviews.text: It is well made as you would expect from a named brand. Easy to use, gives temp in a second. Comes with a few plastic covers and slightly annoyingly, will not operate without a plastic cover. I understand the theory, however part of me is still annoyed. Delivered on time by the ever reliable Amazon. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Grenolad

customer_reviews.title: Dangerously Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read the reviews before I bought this. But because I knew Braun was a good make I didn't. This is AWFUL wildly inaccurate readings on first use. I was on the verge of taking my child to hospital when I first used it showing a temp of over 40 degrees. I then did it on myself and also said I had a high temp when I'm not even unwell. I then took his temp with another thermometer and it read as a normal temp. This is scary for parents to use and think their child is more unwell than they are. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Beki Victoria Laws

customer_reviews.title: Fast, lightweight, accurate thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace an older Braun Thermos an thermometer that was 9 years old and this is very similar, butuch faster and cost about a quarter of the price. Very happy with it and reads the same temperatures as the older one. Provides readings in less than 1 second.
customer_reviews.author: Ewen B

customer_reviews.title: Hugely inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: This product was faulty - gave hugely inaccurate readings from the beginning. I’m an advanced nurse practitioner and compared it to my calibrated device from work. It didn’t get a reading anywhere in rage not once!
customer_reviews.author: M. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Hospital quality readings at home!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this thermometer after a similar one was used on me at the hospital. It couldn’t be easier to use, with very intuitive instructions to get you started. I also purchased the suggested refills that were paired with the product and I truly will never use another thermometer again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Levine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate. Work extremely well. Great packaging. Gives a different warning as per temperature. 1 beep for normal, 2 beeps for high and 3 beeps for very high. Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Good quality ear thermometer, arrived quickly and the price was slightly better than buying in store. Easy to ise, comes with clear instructions on use, easy to read and accurate. The replacement probe covers are also easily sourced at a good price
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: so am disappointed as was hoping it would be more reliable than ...
customer_reviews.text: I sometimes different readings from the same ear sometimes as much as 0.8C, so am disappointed as was hoping it would be more reliable than the cheap one I had. Otherwise it's very easy to use. Am thinking of contacting Braun in case it's faulty as I bought additional plastic caps and a case for it!
customer_reviews.author: Margeireland

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This is waste of money, totally inaccurate readings, turns out I have fever all the time and all other people who used the device. Don't buy it as this is nothing more than waste of almost 30 pounds. That's it, nothing more to add.
customer_reviews.author: Norbert R.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Not reliable at all. Have to take temperature at least 3 times at which point you get a different reading every time with them gradually becoming lower. Don’t know which to choose. Not reliable when you have young children or in the current climate when you rely on an accurate reading to know whether it’s a covid symptom.
customer_reviews.author: Reidy

customer_reviews.title: Braun
customer_reviews.text: Good buy wanted to get a ear thermometer this time as first baby had a fit caused through high temp so i worry its quick and so much less fuss then under arm thermometer and puts mind at rest
customer_reviews.author: alison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect because I was having chemotherapy and needed to check my temp 3 times aday
customer_reviews.author: maureen

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Good for personal and everyday use if you have children at home. The cap doesn't fit very well which is why you'll end up losing it. But overall an accurate, small, easy to use device.
customer_reviews.author: Tanzeel

customer_reviews.title: Could be more accurate
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product, easy to use, however- could be more accurate: basically have to take 3 measurements and take average from them.
customer_reviews.author: Dominik Jay

customer_reviews.title: You need to insert it the right way
customer_reviews.text: So it is accurate when you use it right. Found that on ocasions if you dont insert it in you mr ear the exact way it will show different temperature.
customer_reviews.author: radek

customer_reviews.title: Wholly unreliable readings
customer_reviews.text: Temperature can be over half a degree different in the same ear seconds later. Absolutely ridiculous waste of money. We go from stay at home fever to play outside normal within 5 seconds. Don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Fancy Pants

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I was reading a lot of reviews about termometers and I bought this because has good ones. Now that I have try I can day that this thermometer varies by over a degree on readings from the same ear taken a few seconds apart. Both ears also vary hugely. You cant know if you have temperature if not. This was a complete waste of money. Im dissapointed. I will ask for a replacement to see if mine was faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Pcq

customer_reviews.title: Really inaccurate, unfit for purpose. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This is wildly inaccurate. I can get a temp of 36.9-38.6 in the same ear within a few seconds. I have replaced the ear cup with a new one and have the same issue. I followed all instructions correctly. Read other reviews, GP's who have bought this item have said the same. This would be no good to check for coronavirus fever. Extremely disappointing from Braun and now can't return this piece of junk! They are not cheap either! Dont buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: James Best

customer_reviews.title: Fab product
customer_reviews.text: Fab little thermometer! It still nicely in the storage box. It is also small enough to travel without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Leatt

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Constantly reading at over 38 deg, I took this into my go to confirm readings and it is def inaccurate. Plus the reading from the same ear within seconds varies by at least a degree!! Would not recommend anyone waste their money.
customer_reviews.author: Kssquared

customer_reviews.title: Good value and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clear indicators. Could do with more plastic covers provided. Still working after all this time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price from a quality brand
customer_reviews.text: Cant really comment on accuracy but I know my temp is around 36.4oC and it shows that when I use it. Compared to the £50 ones I use at work (I'm a paramedic) this is a decent one for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very handy to have at home.
customer_reviews.text: Very hand, I had the Doctor on the phone and he asked if I had a temprature, Hang on a second I said, Beep it went And I ttold him and he said yes you have a raised temprature, So yes it's very handy to have, And it's precise.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ian Clark

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate. Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I just got his half an hour ago. I ordered it because my 2 of my kids have a chest infection and have high temperature but I find that the readings are not accurate and different with every reading even if done within seconds. So returning it.
customer_reviews.author: T Roth

customer_reviews.title: Not Accurate
customer_reviews.text: It's compact but does not give you an accurate reading and that was my reason for buying it as it is important to get the right reading would have returned it but through out the box.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate after 3 months purchase
customer_reviews.text: Hi I bought it in December which is about 3 months ago, and the measurement is getting really inaccurate in the range of 1 degree. Could someone please help ASAP? i am disappointed and frustrated when i need to use it in high fever and its giving inaccurate and unreliable temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous and innacurate
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible. I wish I had read the reviews before. It has been driving me insane as I get 38.5 readings followed by 37.1 seconds later. One ear is always different to the other. Have been having a coronavirus paranoia from this terrible item.
customer_reviews.author: Gardenbunny

customer_reviews.title: Good but may not last
customer_reviews.text: Great for checking kids but ours stopped working after couple of years light use. Cheap enough to buy another but shouldn't have to really.
customer_reviews.author: Obscurio

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for the whole family. It is easy to use and seems to be quite accurate. I also bought a large box of the replacement covers as the thermometer cannot be used without them.
customer_reviews.author: Louise886

customer_reviews.title: Awful and inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Awful. My son is having chemo so we needed a reliable thermometer for when he is home. It is so inaccurate, will never have the same reading twice in a row, even if you do it straight away! It said my son went from 38 to 36 in a few seconds! Dangerous product very misleading
customer_reviews.author: gemma griffin

customer_reviews.title: No heated complaints....
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bit of practice, but it does it's job without any trouble and, importantly is accurate - important at a time like this.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Michael LJ Feehan

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived without any ear cap covers,but problem soon solved ,didn’t want to send it back been waiting ages
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Very good thermometer.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to read and gives the temperature within seconds, ideal for taking the temperature of young children. Compact in size also.
customer_reviews.author: ToMo

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend this I think this gives faulty reading. Put it in my ear and have a temp of 38.2 then try it again then it goes to 37.7 after a few minutes. Temperature is never the same.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as the armpit thermometer was taking an age to give a reading. Tried this new one out it said my daughter was 38.5 so I tested on me and said the same for me, I tried my opposite ear and said 37. Tried my other daughters ear it said 38.5 does this thing even do anything or just make up random numbers? My daughters toy thermometer is more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: KINDNESS I HOPE
customer_reviews.text: This was bought to replace one that was stolen from a child’s cancer ward at GOSH , it’s vital for the little ones . How wonderful would it be if this company could send a few , just in case another went walk about. Follow Freddie’s footsteps on Facebook he is a courageous little hero who’s face would light up if he could give the nurses a couple more thermometers
customer_reviews.author: wendy  Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Consistent temp readings, good quality products.
customer_reviews.text: Braun = quality. No issues, very easy to use and quick temp readings which is ideal for kids. Seems to produce consistent temperature readings.
customer_reviews.author: Nozbomber

customer_reviews.title: Good size and price
customer_reviews.text: Great price and like the system where the number of sleeps indicates if temp is ok (one bleep) high (2 bleeps) or very high (3 bleeps...
customer_reviews.author: Zafar Aslam

customer_reviews.title: Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Our first ever electronic thermometer.... Love it. Easy to use and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product easy to use for the whole family makes you to feel safe with covid-19 around
customer_reviews.author: N B

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY inaccurate and unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to find a way to get my money back on this as I need to purchase another one as this varies by atleast a degree when I do a few readings at the same time. purchasing another one that someone has reccomended me means that I will have spent over £40 for a thermometer including this one!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good item.
customer_reviews.text: More reliable than others I have bought before, easy and fast so no messing.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Currie

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and sturdy thermometer.
customer_reviews.text: I am a qualified nurse and bought this to replace my ageing equipment. I am very happy with this and its accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Gullible Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Good value for a quality instrument
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by our granddaughter paramedic and lives up to expectations. Good value for a quality instrument
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: 1 star due to the fact that these are not reliable at all! 5 tests give 5 different readings. Absolute waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Chapchap87

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and really accurate
customer_reviews.text: Great product, they should tell you it comes with 10 of the covers needed to take temperature (we bought more thet were un needed)
customer_reviews.author: Carl H.

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish dofferent readongs each time its used by over a whole degree sometimes. Going to have to buy a new one as so inaccurate.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Carly McGuire

customer_reviews.title: not accurate
customer_reviews.text: i was replacing one i had for a few years,and very disappointed with this ,i found it as bad as the old one and bought one of the old fashioned cheaper ones that go under the tongue and it worked
customer_reviews.author: J. Freeman

product_meta.title: Braun ThermoScan 3 Ear Thermometer
product_meta.description: Braun's ThermoScan 3 Ear Thermometer has an overall compact design and is easy to use, gentle and fast. It takes readings in only one second and helps to interpret the temperature taken with audio fever guidance. This thermometer used infrared technology to take an in ear reading, and has been clinically tested for it's accuracy. In ear thermometer that's suitable for the whole family
feature_bullets: Easy to read display, in either Celsius or Fahrenheit

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,541 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
